name: Hide'N'Seek
description:
A Virtual Reality game of hide and seek! 

If you are a hider, you only have 10 seconds before the seeker will start to chase! There are 5 minutes on the clock so start running! 

If you are a seeker, jump right in and start looking. The hider will be somewhere and it's up to you to find them and catch them before the time runs out! 

All instructions, controls and options for the game are in the hub area, giving you a chance to familiarize yourself in the VR world before you choose one of the three maps available and start playing. If you are the seeker, try and catch the hider as fast as possible. If you are the hider, see if you can outlast the seeker and the clock and stay hidden for all 5 minutes! Good luck!
